reviews.review: WEhat do i have to say except that  this is one of the best games of all time and if you for some reason have not yet played it, you should do it along with portal 2 and the rest of the half-life series.
A fun and unique puzzle platformer.
This game just rocks. I don't have anything else to say.

An artifact from when Valve also made games ... not just money. The story is genuinely brilliant and the gameplay, much like its successor, is intuitive and easy to learn but hard to master 10/10. Buy it on sale and enjoy the 10-15 hours of base storyline it provides.
Challenge modes add anywhere from 5 to 20 hours and at least 2 hernias as well as several mental breakdowns to the game.

That said don't think it'll be a nice and easy game to 100%, those 15 achievements look deceptively easy and the achievement: 'Aperture Science' was made by The Beelzebub himself. The before mentioned achievement only has a completion rate of 1.8% 13 YEARS after its release ... you will want to pull your hair out but that's part of the fun.
Yep! It's Portal, even 13 years later, it's still good.

2~3시간이면 엔딩봄.
단순 퍼즐게임인줄 알고 안했었는데 포탈 특유의 감성을 이제 알겠음...ㅠㅠ
2도 해야지
그래서 내 케이크는 택배로 보내주시나요?
This is the best pussle game ever
考验逆向思维的三维题
Amazing and Mind bending game. I highly recommend that you get this and Portal 2.

Игра для развития дотеров/кс'еров.
Теперь понятно почему я туплю на одной комнате 2 часа.
Походу надо удалять доту *-*

1 hour of gameplay in it.

My latest run took me 41 mins.
“它将为玩家带来数十小时独一无二的游戏体验。”
топ игрушка с класнай графекай всем савитую

操作方式和通关策略还是蛮简单的，这个游戏我认为优秀的地方在于一种理念和操作模式。
前半段给我的感觉像是异次元杀阵，后半段就开始有趣了起来。
怎么说呢，蛮喜欢这类新奇的感觉和游戏的，爱了爱了~
除了期间有些不适应的头晕，和卡关的痛苦外（还好有小伙伴在线帮忙，感动哭了），整体还不错哦！
ps结尾的音乐蛮好听的哟~
gioco molto bello, alcune volte devi usare il cervello più di quanto tu lo stia usando ma comunque questo gioco è un capolavoro.
I LIKE THIS GAME VERY MUCH I HAVE PLAYED TRUE IT 6 OR 7 TIMES ALREDY
Can easily put multiple hours in. The second game was a great way to continue it too.
Игра отличная, а тортики такие мне не нравятся. Пирог с картохой - лучший стимул.
Отличная игра! Динамика, сюжет и сама идея - высший класс. Если Вам тоже понравилось, то от Portal 2 Вы будете просто в восторге;)
es un juego bastante bueno, es excelente seria la palabra y la segunda entrega de este gran juego igual.

Good game, great story though if you are looking for comedy go to Portal 2. The first game is much more serious though it does give a useful background. Beware the game is very short; if it is your first time playing, chances are, you will beat in 3-4 hours.
amazing game story is great but it can only be appreciated with its sequel

玩了十几年3D游戏的人，在这里晕3D了。。
游戏的解谜节奏不错，难度适中。
建议进游戏就开字幕，我一开始把G姐的声音当成游戏性的系统声音，根本没在听，后来才发现是剧情的一部分，还回头补了下前几关的剧情，通关后感觉剧情还不错。
2代也入手了，等头晕缓解了再玩。。

最近インストールしたばかりのsteamで一番満足したゲーム。
瞬発力のあるゲームは得意ではないが、これはゆっくり思考を巡らした謎解きで楽しめる！！
They should make a second one
This is an amazing game.... Second one's better, but you gotta play this to understand that one.
Portal is a fun and inventive way to get the brain thinking, this game forces you to think outside of the box and use critical thinking and problem solving skills.

Great game for figuring stuff out and planning strategies.  Only problem is freezing up.  When I first started playing this game a number of years ago it always worked flawlessly and never locked up.  Now it locks up/freezes all the time and I have to restart the game numerous times, even within a single level.  it's very frustrating.  I've tried a number of "fixes" and none of them work.  The longer I play, the more frequently it locks up.  I'm wondering if it has to do with the saves the game is making.  More saves = more freezing.  That's the only drawback to this otherwise great game.
A game i think everyone should play in their life. incredibly fun, hilarious, and a classic
I don't know if it's possible to make a perfect video game, but Portal is a strong argument supporting that statement.

Ah, yes Portal. I did not know much about this game regrettably, or Half life in general until this year when a few youtubers I watch played it (including jacksepticeye). And I bought the bundle for Portal 1 and Portal 2. And I must say the hype around this game is true. This truly is, dare I say, one of the BEST sci-fi/horror games of all time. The ending theme, the graphics, the gameplay and all. And the graphics are outstanding for a game from 2007. Good job. I really hope for a Portal 3 some time, even if it's focused on another character since Chell's story feels more or less complete
I love the Puzzles and it feels very rewarding when you complete a puzzle you have been stuck on for a while. So i would recommend this for anyone who likes Puzzles

Absolutely groundbreaking at the time, still astounding today. I so wish there was more of it. This game perfectly captures the "feel" Portal, in my opinion is supposed to have. Don't get me wrong, I love Portal 2 as well, but has a fairly different, less sterilised and controlled feel. 

Chelleven/10 would get shanked up by companion cube again.

I really underestimated this game, even with the years of praise. It has really great dialogue and its atmosphere  gets increasingly tense as the cracks in this mysterious facility begin to present them self. Portal is most definitely a classic.

Great game! I love its silent, mysterious features!  
Really entertaining gameplay. 
Graphics: Ahead of their their time.
Story/Dialogues: Loved them.
Humour: 11/10
Прикольно, не для тупых) прошел легко, пойду в portal 2,посмотрю что там
ИГРА ПОЧТИ ИДЕАЛЬНАЯ ИЗ-ЗА ТУПОЙ ХРЕНИ , ТО ЧТО МОЖНО СТАВИТЬ ПОРТАЛЫ ЗА ТЕКСТУРЫ
second only to half life as my favorite video game franchise, though i guess you could consider them somewhat the same franchise?
Uno de los mejores juegos que jugué en mucho tiempo
Советую всем поиграть в эту игру,кто ещё не играл. Игра с отличным сюжетом и с отличными головоломками.Я думаю,вам игра должна понравится и поломать вам мозги.

Juego de plataformas/puzzle muy divertido, con mecánicas muy chulas y una de las mejores antagonistas de los videojuegos. 
Grande entre los grandes.
Игра короткая. Очень легко выучить её наизусть. За эти деньги лучше купить 2-ю часть, т.к в этой сюжет почть полностью отсутствует в отличии от той же второй части.

Portal, in a nutshell, has become a timeless classic of Valve. Despite it being nearly 13 years old (as of writing), it hasn't really seemed to fade out to existence either. Its mechanics and graphics have seemed to age very well, it is still challenging enough for most people (especially the bonus maps) and it's humour and wit never fails to make me laugh.

Without a doubt one of the best games I've played

If you played portal 2 before portal this game might look like a knockoff but give it a try puzzles are not that hard and gameplay mechanics are easy to understand. Game finishes quickly but its not a problem because there are a lot of extra challanges you can do like advanced chambers.
Maybe the only downside of this game is when you use momentum thourgh portals camera turn around slowly and this can get you a little bit motion sick.

The cake is a lie!
The cake is a lie!
The cake is a lie!
The cake is a lie!

Mas allá de la historia y el trasfondo que tuvo este juegazo, el hecho de que haya sido ideado por un pequeño grupo de desarrolladores, que haya no solo cumplido con las expectativas en su lanzamiento sino haberlas superado por completo al salir junto con half life y tf2 en la oragnge box, es el concepto de este juego lo que hace que me guste tanto. 
Muy pocos juegos fueron innovadores al punto de Portal, entrtenidos y llenos de puzzles bien pensados y justificados. 
Esperé 10 años para jugar este juego, Y SUPERO MIS EXPECTATIVAS

Nunca es tarde para jugar a Portal. Eso si, al ser tan corto recomiendo comprarlo en ofertas

This game has a twist that will chill your bones so much that an igloo will seem like a sauna.
Amazing puzzles and mechanics. 10/10 would be freaked the fuck out again.
The Enrichment Center reminds you that the Weighted Companion Cube will never threaten to stab you and, in fact, cannot speak.
